genius.core.boaframework

Class BoaParty

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.parties.AbstractNegotiationParty
      • genius.core.boaframework.BoaParty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NegotiationParty, java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class BoaParty
extends AbstractNegotiationParty
    This class is used to convert a BOA party to a real agent. This class is special in that it is constructed directly by a BoaPartyRepItem.

    You can extend this directly to build your own BoaParty from your BOA components. To do this, override the init(NegotiationInfo) call like this:

      
 @Override
 public void init(NegotiationInfo info) {
        .. setup your_ac, acparams etc...
        configure(your_ac, acparams, your_os,osparams, your_om, omparams,
                your_oms, omsparams); 
        super.init(info);
 }
    And of course you should do the usual override's of NegotiationParty functions.

    For more information, see: Baarslag T., Hindriks K.V., Hendrikx M., Dirkzwager A., Jonker C.M. Decoupling Negotiating Agents to Explore the Space of Negotiation Strategies. Proceedings of The Fifth International Workshop on Agent-based Complex Automated Negotiations (ACAN 2012), 2012. https://homepages.cwi.nl/~baarslag/pub/Decoupling_Negotiating_Agents_to_Explore_the_Space_of_Negotiation_Strategies_ACAN_2012.pdf

    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public BoaParty configure(AcceptanceStrategy ac,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> acParams,
                          OfferingStrategy os,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> osParams,
                          OpponentModel om,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> omParams,
                          OMStrategy oms,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> omsParams)
        Stores all relevant values for initializing the components. Will be used when init is called. This has therefore to be called either as first call in init, or before the call to init.
        Parameters:
        ac - AcceptanceStrategy
        acParams - a Map containing the init parameters for the AcceptanceStrategy
        os - OfferingStrategy
        osParams - a Map containing the init parameters for the OfferingStrategy
        om - OpponentModel
        omParams - a Map containing the init parameters for the OpponentModel
        oms - OMStrategy
        omsParams - a Map containing the init parameters for the OMStrategy

      • init

        public void init(NegotiationInfo info)
        Description copied from interface: NegotiationParty
        Initializes the party, informing it of many negotiation details. This MUST be called exactly once, immediately after construction of any class implementing this.
        Specified by:
        init in interface NegotiationParty
        Overrides:
        init in class AbstractNegotiationParty
        Parameters:
        info - information about the negotiation that this party is part of.

      • receiveMessage

        public void receiveMessage(AgentID sender,
                           Action opponentAction)
        Follows the BOA flow for receiving an offer: 1. store the details of the received bid. 2. tell the OpponentModel to update itself based on the received bid.
        Specified by:
        receiveMessage in interface NegotiationParty
        Overrides:
        receiveMessage in class AbstractNegotiationParty
        Parameters:
        sender - The initiator of the action.This is either the AgentID, or null if the sender is not an agent (e.g., the protocol).
        opponentAction - The action performed

      • chooseAction

        public Action chooseAction(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Action>> possibleActions)
        Follows the BOA flow for making an offer: 1. ask the OfferingStrategy for a bid. 2. ask the AcceptanceStrategy if the opponent bid needs to be accepted instead.
        Parameters:
        possibleActions - List of all actions possible.
        Returns:
        The chosen Action.

      • endSession

        public void endSession(NegotiationResult result)
        Method that first calls the endSession method of each component to receiveMessage the session data and then stores the session data if it is not empty and is changed.
